review: I am not very good with audio visual stuff but the Fire Stick was easy to set up.  It connects much faster than my Blu-ray in another room.  It replaced another blu-ray that just wouldn't connect well in my bedroom.  It connects to wi-fi quickly, loads Netflix and Prime quickly which are the two I use, and is a lot less visable than the blu-ray box I had.The remote is easy to use.  It doesn't have a lot of confusing buttons for me.  I have some arthritis in my hands and it is easy to navigate with it.
author: Amazon Customer "Mary"
